attributes.action: Establish a Male breast cancer awareness day .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My name is Sean Cooper and I am a two and a half year male breast cancer survivor. I have been working with male breast cancer (MBC) organizations in the the United States and Canada in a global effort to increase MBC awareness. Cancer Research UK statistics ( http://info.cancerresearchuk.org/cancerstats/types/breast/incidence/) show that 314 men in the United Kingdom were diagnosed with MBC in 2006. Globally the numbers are continuing to increase.We are working to have a Global Male Breast Cancer awareness day,and would appreciate help from the British Government in achieving this !
